data.lyric:
[ti:Elevate (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.37]Elevate (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.90]Producer：Nonstop Da Hitman/PARTYNEXTDOOR
[00:01.70]Drake：
[00:11.15]Ayy elevate elevate
[00:16.03]Only obligation is to tell it straight
[00:19.10]So much on my plate I gotta delegate
[00:21.94]Baka passed a drug test we gotta celebrate
[00:25.02]I'm in bed awake thinkin' how'd I make
[00:28.62]All this happen for myself and my family
[00:31.96]All this happen for myself and my family
[00:35.15]There's no way that this is real man it can't be
[00:40.93]Yeah yeah
[00:43.85]Drake/French Montana：
[00:44.47]If you need me you can't call me I stay busy makin' money
[00:50.54]You know what is on my mind all I think about is hunnids
[00:56.90]I stay busy bzz workin' on me
[01:00.02]I stay busy with my business homie
[01:03.16]I already hit her when you left her lonely
[01:06.41]She is not the type that likes to take things slowly
[01:09.52]Slowly my mouth is goin' off I don't know patience
[01:12.93]I got a chance then my n**gas got it too like it's contagious
[01:16.69]I see the future when I get wavy
[01:19.57]Wavy God
[01:20.49]But I couldn't picture bein' Champagne haan
[01:22.24]When I would buy that sh*t and save it for the right occasion
[01:26.02]I couldn't picture changes when I was with Ms. Creighton
[01:29.15]That lady hates me
[01:30.67]Couldn't picture wifin' Braden when I was pumpin' gas
[01:33.56]On road trips to go from Cincinnati on to Dayton
[01:36.55]I couldn't gauge it
[01:38.86]I wanna thank God for workin' way harder than Satan
[01:41.63]He's playin' favorites it feels amazin' yeah
[01:47.38]Drake：
[01:47.64]Elevate elevate
[01:50.79]Only obligation is to tell it straight
[01:53.92]Me and all the guys found a better way
[01:56.73]This a life bid we can never separate
[01:59.83]I'm in bed awake thinkin' how'd I make
[02:03.39]All this happen for myself and my family
[02:06.71]All this happen for myself and my family
[02:09.86]There's no way that this is real man it can't be
[02:12.90]Drake：
[02:26.06]Yeah I can only tell you sh*t in pieces
[02:29.38]As it happens to me I begin to write the thesis
[02:32.65]Franny got the Aria setup like it's a Freaknik
[02:35.82]Vegas like Marineland that big whale treatment
[02:39.05]Georgie got me up a hunnid thousand for the weekend
[02:42.06]I gotta move the safe beside the bed when I be sleepin'
[02:45.31]My mood is changin' this summer I'ma be tweakin'
data.trans:
[ti:Elevate (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.37]//
[00:00.90]//
[00:01.70]//
[00:11.15]嗨了 嗨了
[00:16.03]唯一要做的就是开门见山地说
[00:19.10]我的碟里东西很多 我得挑一些有代表性的
[00:21.94]Baka Not Nice 通过了**检测 我们要好好庆祝一些 
[00:25.02]我躺在床上没有睡着 我怎么会
[00:28.62]让这一切发生在我和我家人身上
[00:31.96]让这一切发生在我和我家人身上
[00:35.15]没有什么是这个真汉子做不到的 
[00:40.93]//
[00:43.85]//
[00:44.47]如果你需要我 可别给我打电话 我忙着赚钱呢
[00:50.54]你知道我在想什么 我只想要钱
[00:56.90]我一直很忙 为我工作
[01:00.02]我一直忙于我的事业 兄弟
[01:03.16]当你留下她独守空房时 我已经得到她了
[01:06.41]她并不是那种喜欢循序渐进的人
[01:09.52]慢慢地 我的嘴巴就不受控制了 我没有耐心
[01:12.93]我得到一个机会 接着我的伙计也得到了 好像会传染似的
[01:16.69]当我处于上升期时 我看见了未来
[01:19.57]处于上升期 上帝
[01:20.49]但我无法想象自己成功时的样子
[01:22.24]但我会把香槟买好 留到合适的场合喝
[01:26.02]我没有发现什么变化 当我和卡里特小姐在一起时 
[01:29.15]那个妞很恨我
[01:30.67]无法想象自己娶布莱登为妻的样子 但我抽着**时
[01:33.56]开始自驾游 从辛辛那提到代顿
[01:36.55]我无法估测
[01:38.86]我要感谢上帝比撒旦更努力地工作
[01:41.63]他给了我最爱的  这种感觉很奇妙
[01:47.38]//
[01:47.64]嗨了 嗨了
[01:50.79]唯一要做的就是开门见山地说
[01:53.92]我和所有人都找到了更好的办法
[01:56.73]这是为了生存 碧池 我们永远不能分开
[01:59.83]我躺在床上没有睡着 想着我怎么会
[02:03.39]让这一切发生在我和我家人身上
[02:06.71]让这一切发生在我和我家人身上
[02:09.86]没有什么是这个真汉子做不到的 
[02:12.90]//
[02:26.06]我只能一点点地告诉你
[02:29.38]碰巧我开始写论文了
[02:32.65]歌手Franny经常用咏叹调 好像是Freaknik派对一样
[02:35.82]我在维加斯的待遇好像是在海洋公园 可以看到大鲸鱼
[02:39.05]乔治亚让我一个周末就赚了几百万
[02:42.06]当我睡觉的时候 我必须把保险箱放在床边
[02:45.31]我的情绪改变了整个夏天 我要有所作为
